aboutus.title: About Tag B Group
aboutus.intro: With over two decades of experience, Tag-B Group has become of one of the most recognizable franchises for professional transportation, parking management, garage management, and valet services in Washington D.C. Founded by Taweke Alemayehu, Tag-B Group has become an incorporated business compiled of six successful companies in the Washington D.C. Metropolitan area including:

companies.title: Tag-B Valet
companies.content: offering valet services at special events, commercial and private establishments, as well as hospitals and healthcare buildings.

companies.title: Tag-B Parking Management
companies.content: providing garage management as well as special event, private party, commercial, hospital and healthcare parking services

companies.title: Tag-B Transportation
companies.content: supplying transportation services such as taxi, limo, van, shuttle, bus and private car options within the DC Metropolitan area. Handicap accessible services are also available.

companies.title: Tag-B Ventures
companies.content: bringing entertainment to the residents of the DC metropolitan area through bars, night clubs, lounges and restaurants.

companies.title: Tag-B Financial
companies.content: offering financial services on a global scale with a focus on remittances between the United States and the international community.

companies.title: Tag-B Consulting
companies.content: providing business consulting services for businesses of all sizes both domestically and internationally.
